mapper.insert: insert into chat_file ( filename, path, size, uploader_id, status ) values (#{filename}, #{path}, #{size}, #{uploaderId}, #{status})
mapper.select: select * from chat_file where id = #{id} and not is_deleted
mapper.update: update chat_file set filename = #{filename}, path = #{path}, size = #{size}, uploader_id = #{uploaderId}, status = #{status} where id = #{id}
